2.7.25  4:56 pm   do you like avocados

Â Â Â Â Â  i respect them

2.7.25  3:14 pm   why is "per se" only ever used in negative statements

Â Â Â Â Â  they don't have to be negative per se

2.7.25  3:01 pm   Hello Bill Wurtz
Have you ever considered doing a tape release of your music or even a VHS release of your music videos? There's at least one person out there in this wide open abyss of a world who would buy the hell out of that type of stuff

Â Â Â Â Â  that's something that doesn't really appeal to me, but i know it appeals to plenty of other artists, so i assure you there is no shortage of content for you to buy the hell out of

2.7.25  2:38 pm   Should the sky be legally required to be green instead of red?

Â Â Â Â Â  it should be required to be both. that way it can be wrong all the time

2.7.25  1:25 pm   I don't know what to do. Do you?

Â Â Â Â Â  some of the time

2.7.25  1:21 pm   i agree with you, 2 + 2 has been 4 for so many darn years!  we need a new answer, what should it be?

Â Â Â Â Â  i don't agree with the need for a new answer

2.7.25  12:57 pm   Do you like apples?

Â Â Â Â Â  i just like the way they look

2.7.25  12:14 pm   it feels narcissitic to create art for yourself  but also to share it with friends/an internet community hoping for recognition, even though I don't think that's the case

Â Â Â Â Â  maybe you can do both, as a compromise

2.7.25  11:53 am   I need ideas for drawing, mind if ya give me something?

Â Â Â Â Â  my only advice is to draw everything

2.7.25  10:44 am   one time i jumped relly high

Â Â Â Â Â  [nods understandingly]

2.7.25  9:11 am   The academic stress stole away my creativity and imagination What to do

Â Â Â Â Â  just being aware of the issue might be just enough

2.7.25  9:10 am   how do i deal with the fear towards so many great and inevitable things (for example, death) that sometimes unexpectedly consumes me whole late at night?

Â Â Â Â Â  make some plans for what else you might do in the meantime

2.7.25  9:10 am   I find that setting screens to black and white seems to rot my brain less and makes the real world more interesting. You ever tried it?

Â Â Â Â Â  no but i'll consider it

2.7.25  3:33 am   hello billiam I like your creations. this has probably already been asked but there's approximately a million answers here already so how did you start making music and how much do you use the professional music techniques vs wing it (this is coming from a non musician I apologize) also you act like a cryptid with incomprehensible knowledge and I admire this

Â Â Â Â Â  i rely primarily on my own intuitions, but i've also taken great care to also assimilate that with terminology used by working musicians today

2.7.25  3:18 am   Please tell me a sexy math fact.

Â Â Â Â Â  3x4 = 4x3

2.7.25  2:15 am   Dude, Phoebe Katis just released a the most authentic approximation of a Bill Wurtz song (musically) I've ever heard. "i'm a kid"

I should probably make this a question. Umm. As the resident Bill Wurtz expert, how many points does she get

Â Â Â Â Â  i produced the music and played all the instruments except voice. what she truly gets points for is, convincing me to produce a song for an artist other than myself. never happens, and will probably never happen again. this is not to say i didn't have a great time doing it, and i'm glad she was able to talk me into it

2.7.25  1:46 am   where was geography invented

Â Â Â Â Â  by that name, let's say Greece. but it's common sense anywhere

2.7.25  1:22 am   how many fingers am I holding up

Â Â Â Â Â  none of them

2.7.25  1:00 am   why are you

Â Â Â Â Â  because i can

2.7.25  12:19 am   Which NYC neighborhood are you the least familiar with? As in, one you've rarely spent any time in, one you don't really know much about...and why do you think this is?

Â Â Â Â Â  i have never been to Riker's island. this is because i have yet to fall into a life of crime, knock on wood

2.6.25  10:59 pm   why was it called the civil war if the people were anything but civil?

Â Â Â Â Â  the word's meaning must have bent. this is typical behavior of words. words are like the most bendy thing out there

2.6.25  10:23 pm   Can i ask another questrion?

Â Â Â Â Â  no, just this one

2.6.25  10:17 pm   do you use music theory in your music or do you write songs just based on ears?

Â Â Â Â Â  if those are considered different strategies, then that would be a fucked up world to live in, that's for sure

2.6.25  9:55 pm   What rhymes with apple? 

Â Â Â Â Â  Snapple

2.6.25  9:36 pm   does glitter ever make you angry

Â Â Â Â Â  i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

2.6.25  9:01 pm   what's your favorite flower

Â Â Â Â Â  the insane one, i always forget what it's called

2.6.25  8:56 pm   How do you know if anything exists?

Â Â Â Â Â  first let's figure out what we think 'exist' means

2.6.25  8:32 pm   do you still have the 26 hour day schedule and do you have tips for someone on a shifting schedule like that

Â Â Â Â Â  i don't recall having a consistent 26 hour schedule. the 24 hour rhythm always seems to prevail somehow in one way or another, even if it results in total destruction

2.6.25  8:13 pm   are you the change that you want to see in the world?

Â Â Â Â Â  only part of it

2.6.25  7:39 pm   what's the third best way to eat a potato?

Â Â Â Â Â  i can't even think of 2 ways

2.6.25  6:52 pm   what are you thinking about?

Â Â Â Â Â  i was trying to think about everything, but i'm not sure if that works

2.6.25  6:45 pm   What's your opinion/take on average pop chord progressions?

Â Â Â Â Â  having heard perhaps over a million pop songs, that question has never made less sense to me

2.6.25  6:40 pm   How do you proclaim your profession without sounding pretentious?

Â Â Â Â Â  maybe you could lie about your profession. maybe it will balance out all the other people around the world who lie about their profession to make it sound more pretentious

2.6.25  5:29 pm   what is the name of the instrument that you use most of the time in your videos?

Â Â Â Â Â  keyboard

2.6.25  5:05 pm   are we an egg?

Â Â Â Â Â  i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

2.6.25  3:54 pm   how do i pull myself out of a barren wasteland?

Â Â Â Â Â  sometimes you can just skip to the next wasteland over

2.6.25  3:22 pm   anybody in their right mind would skip post-post-modernism and go straight to post-post-post-modernism, you know what i mean

Â Â Â Â Â  that sounds like kind of a slippery slope

2.6.25  3:03 pm   how to deal with people being obsessively parasocial about you? 

Â Â Â Â Â  i have a handbook i can refer to sometimes

2.6.25  2:17 pm   maybe genres are supposed to be some kind of weird abstract punchline to a joke 

Â Â Â Â Â  it feels like a form of gaslighting

2.6.25  1:22 pm   How many default cubes do you estimate to have removed in blender?

Â Â Â Â Â  maybe 2. my default template does not begin with a cube

2.6.25  12:17 pm   When did humans start consuming milk?

Â Â Â Â Â  presumably right in the direct center of the dark ages

2.6.25  12:09 pm   Do these emojis show up?ğŸ’ˆğŸ

Â Â Â Â Â  for me at this moment, yes. but the challenging thing about emojis is that we really have no idea for whom and when else they will show up

Â Â Â Â Â  the same way you would in any economy

Â Â Â Â Â  no it's not

2.6.25  6:49 am   im in my 3rd year of university and bc of me taking a certain class in my second year that's now part of my minor, i don't have to take that class this semester because i already took it last year and it's gonna count towards my minor but because of that i have to take another class from the bachelor curriculum because at first that second year class was gonna count towards my bachelor but now its gonna count towards my minor which means there's not enough ECs counting towards my bachelor anymore so im gonna take another class for my bachelor so i chose a class that's being taught by a teacher i like that i also kind of wanted to take in the second year but the thing is that this class is on a subject that a different type of people than me usually gravitate towards. i would say it's like the jocks of my bachelor programme that will be taking this class and that scares me a little bit. on top of that there's probably also gonna be a lot of second years there because not very many third years will be taking an extra bachelor class at this point in the third year because they will all be working on their theses which is also what im doing but i just needed to fill up some space that inadvertently was left empty in my bachelor programme. what's your favorite fruit

Â Â Â Â Â  the insane one, i always forget what it's called

2.6.25  4:51 am   how many monkeys does it take to balance out love and hatred

Â Â Â Â Â  NMN, no monkeys needed

2.6.25  4:37 am   how do i find the motivation to learn an instrument? i'm trying to learn guitar but i can't find the time or motivation to pick up my guitar and actually try

Â Â Â Â Â  it sounds like you just don't want to. the great news here is that you probably don't have to. you can do something you find more interesting instead
